website_summaries.verdict: Set up several rooms in your house with night-lights that are programmed to automatically turn on whenever they sense the room is dark enough to need it.
pros: Buyers rave about eufy’s customer service
Bright enough to softly illuminate a dark room/hallway, but the light won’t wake you up
Automatically turn on when it senses darkness
Comes in a 4-pack, making it an inexpensive investment
Designed to run efficiently, costing you cents per year to run
cons: Designed to go in the top socket while pointing the light downward, which makes it tough to plug something in the lower outlet

customer_reviews.title: Soft and functional night light
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these night lights for a day, but I highly recommend them up to this point. Each light arrived in proper working order and I love that these lights do not have a strong glare and are not too bright. You can see your way around if you wake up mid-sleep, but the light isn’t so strong as to wake you up. See photos of the night light in my guest bathroom with the bathroom light on then off.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Work well - I like them, but they don’t turn on soon enough.
customer_reviews.text: I like these lights because they look nice, don’t block other outlets, point the light downwards, and use minimal electricity. One thing I don’t like, is they are very sensitive to light - it has to be pretty dark before they come on, and if they catch light from another room, they dim or go off. They’ll dim or brighten just from a person walking nearby and their shadow changing the amount of light getting to the sensor. However, they do get pretty bright when it is dark - I have to shut the bathroom door at night to block the light from coming into the bedroom and keeping me awake.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Green Product
customer_reviews.text: If you're interested in saving energy ⛮ dollars these will do the job. Extremely sensitive to light. If you have these in an adjacent room with lights on, the smallest amount of light reaches the sensor in other room, these lights will turn off. These are very sleek looking and the light is a natural brightness, not glaring. These are well made. I live in a small studio where natural light reaches from one end to the other during the daytime without turning on lights and these stay off until dusk.
customer_reviews.author: The Victor

customer_reviews.title: No Motion Detection for Plug In model!
customer_reviews.text: Since they are selling two different products in the same page, with the same Q&A list, it can easily be understood that the plug in model has motion detection capabilities, meaning it would come on when motion is detected and the the light level is low enough. However these would just stay on through the night which is a waste since my ghosts have been doing perfectly fine without light at night for centuries.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Durango

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, inconsistent, and disappointing (along many dimensions)
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This performance review is based on an earlier purchase, which I deemed sufficiently adequate to justify an additional one, though, since, the product has demonstrated that it is inconsistent and reliable. For THIS purchase, the package arrived EMPTY, so I am unable to comment on any product contained therein. However, my review (and lowest possible ranking) is, indeed, based on actual experience with this product from this company. My original review was so scathing that Amazon declined to publish it, so this one is substantially watered-down. However, the result is the same. I will not recommend buying this product from this company... that's the bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Space

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results.
customer_reviews.text: Right now, a little over a month later, 4 of the 6 work. The 4 are great though!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Renee

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later, outlet buzzing
customer_reviews.text: These night lights were truly awesome for a while. The right color setting, the perfect night activated light. But then my outlets started buzzing. Electrician says there's nothing wrong with the outlets themselves, and it only happens when these are plugged in. I don't personally feel that it's safe anymore, so I'm removing it. Take that with a grain of salt, because it has been 2 years since I initially put them in. They're still lighting up, but after reading the fire hazard review, I'm removing them from my outlets.
customer_reviews.author: CATeaching

customer_reviews.title: Too Bright
customer_reviews.text: These eufy lights are just too bright to be used as a nightlight. They are more like task lights. The images also don't really show how these work. There is a single, down-firing LED that shines onto the beige concave plastic housing to "diffuse" the light. All this does is end up throwing a lot of light down with little diffused glow. On the plus side - even though I don't recognize the name "eufy", they are made by Anker so they should be of decent quality. Still, I returned them because they're just too darned bright for what they're supposed to be used for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. ZahoroskyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: For my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog is going blind, so she's a little afraid of the dark. I am light sensitive, so this creates a bit of a problem. The solution? Nightlights! Everywhere! For now at least, she can find her way to her bed, or to her water bowl, or to the back door. These provide plenty of light to navigate through a room at night and shut themselves off during the day. I can tell they're bright enough because she isn't standing in the hallway crying anymore. Want some light, but not all the light? And then several of them for all of your house? Get these. My dog said so.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey mariner

customer_reviews.title: One already stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed. I bought these less than 4 months ago and I just turned off lights in my daughter's room and it failed to turn on. It now only turns on if there is movement but the light sensor completely broke. This is very bad considering that I have other night lights that I've had for over 7 years and they still work.
customer_reviews.author: happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits great, perfect bed light!
customer_reviews.text: Soft white downward light, super fast sensor response, tested it in a closet with door opened and closed, looks great, fits great, perfect bed light, but also can be a perfect hallway night light or any other location that you want to automatically light up at night, LED so energy cost I am sure is very low, another cool thing is that it gradually dims and brightens with the amount of light that falls on it...
customer_reviews.author: sonnyblastninja

customer_reviews.title: REALLY NICE, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: REALLY NICE, especially for the price! I will never buy or use an incandescent 4 or 7 watt bulb again the newer technologies are the way to go. We have them in our kitchen, hall areas, even the garage. We plan on adding more, nice soft down light with a photo eye is even better than our old hall too bright light LED light which we moved to the cellar. Michael EDIT ADD - We put one of these in our garage and turned it UPSIDE DOWN and it throws more light on the ceiling and walls when you need to run out at night. Nice. 1/12/2018 - All are still l working great. Michael
customer_reviews.author: mjp28

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor does not work! And one of them did not light up at all!
customer_reviews.text: Motion sensor does not work! And got my lights and one don't even work properly and now it completely quit! Save your money! I got a replacement set they all work and one quit again after 2 days what a joke! They are nice that they Point down rather than at you but product quality is not very good if they do not work one out of four each time ordered! Now I know why they call them eify! IF They work! Would give them 0 Stars IF I could!
customer_reviews.author: FUUBAR!

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm-ish light, pretty bright, THOUGHTLESS design
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of light this emits- it's fairly bright. It looks pretty nice. In fact I like everything about this, except one big thing: Who came up with the idea of putting the plug on the wrong end? When this is put in a normal (duplex) outlet, the light shines directly on the other plug (if you are using both outlets), which blocks most of the light. I taped over the sensor, so I could provide a small amount of ambient lighting to take this photo, illustrating my point.
customer_reviews.author: Lunix

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little lights
customer_reviews.text: We've been impressed by these little LED night lights. They put out the perfect amount of light at night and the color temperature is just right (a warm yellow tint). They've been in continuous use every night since we got them and haven't had any issues yet. Since they're so small they also don't block the other plug on the wall. Also noticed that the light sensor errs on the side of darkness so they don't really turn on until it's fairly dark, which we like. Have another cheapo night light with a light sensor in the kid's room that seems like it's on all the time even though there's plenty of daylight coming through the window.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Already not working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about a week ago. The lights have already dimmed or are completely not working. As for motion sensor, that feature never worked. Based on the price, i figured i'd keep them because initially they were very bright, but they dimmed or died so quickly that I wish I had returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenehoo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Night Lights
customer_reviews.text: The LED warm white night lights are superb and I plan on getting more for my parents to use. The light is brighter than regular bulb night lights, casting enough illumination for walking around the house at night. Their light becomes brighter as dusk turns to darkness. Everything I was looking for. Another plus, all recyclable packaging!
customer_reviews.author: MommaRoo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I picked up these eufy Lumi Plug-In Night Lights recently and they are performing well. It’s a simple product that fits my needs. I have them plugged in around the house and they provide enough light to navigate around at night. The lights will automatically turn off if a light source reaches the sensors. Natural daylight or room lighting will shut it off. If something is blocking the light from reaching the sensor then it will not. I have one area in my home that doesn’t have good lighting so the eufy light stays on. However, the light uses very low wattage so I don’t mind keeping it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT  led bright white.. these give off a yellow glow
customer_reviews.text: These light are do not emit a white LED light, they emit a Yellow glow the same as the old fashion night lights. I really doubt these are LED at all. Since they are crap, I might just take one apart to find out. Stay tuned.. Unless you like a yellow glow.. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: stan pappy

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: These work the way they’re supposed to, my only concern is they cover the entire outlet so you can’t put anything else there. They’re also kinda weird in how the light faces. My outlets are placed horizontally so I wish the nightlights had the feature of rotating to accommodate that the way the wall flowers at bath and body works do. So instead of the light facing toward the ground, it ends up facing to the side. That makes weird shadows and they kind of freak out my little sister, which ultimately defeats the purpose of a night light. The drawbacks aren’t worth returning the items but I wouldn’t repurchase unless they rectify the aforementioned.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper909

customer_reviews.title: Well made, warm, down-firing night light, but too bright for some locations
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and well packaged dawn-to-dusk night light. It has a warm, soft light (around 2700k) that is perfect for a night light. There is no dimmer adjustment but the light automatically fluctuated based on ambient light conditions. It is downward firing so it really helps seeing the floor at night. It only works in the upper outlet if you want the other outlet to remain free. This is odd because if something is in the lower outlet then some light is blocked. But my biggest complaint is it too bright for me. I would not want to place this anywhere near the bed at night.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights and their 18mo warranty
customer_reviews.text: Simply put—I love these lights! I got them to light up our upstairs when our baby was born a year ago. It was the perfect amount of light to be able to see things during the night for feedings. We’re all able to sleep well and not be disturbed by a bright light. After a year one of the lights burnt out, but fortunately, the company the company has an 18month warranty on these lights. I had a great costumer service experience and was give a replacement set. I didn’t even have to return the bad ones. It was completely hassle-free. I will definitely order other products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice night lights!
customer_reviews.text: I chose these lights because they are small. Originally I thought 3 of 4 were not working because only one works in dim light but then learned they are supposed to turn on only in total darkness, so all four work! In my opinion their points of light are too bright and hurt my eyes when I go to the bathroom in the middle of the night, but I switched the one in my bathroom to an outlet that's behind a freestanding towel rack and the towel diffuses the light, so it now it feels very inviting and doesn't wake me up. The lights are warm in color and it looks like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I traveled recently and put one in the hotel bathrooms so that we could see at night. Plenty of light to see by, yet not so much as to disturb sleepers. The light is reasonably bright, but it points downward so it illuminates the floor more than ceiling - that's nice when you walk into the bathroom at night: plenty to see by but not so much as to hurt your eyes. Lightweight and compact (2-3/8" square). I had a problem with one light in the set and Eufy responded immediately and replaced the light. This is the nicest nightlight I've found! Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: kh808

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but light is too bright and too white for a night light.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Anker / Eufy and related company products. This was certainly a good value and they are super easy to use, given the integrated light sensor. The reason I chopped a couple of stars is they are too bright and the light is not warm enough. I had hoped to use these to illuminate a path to the bathroom, for instance, but the ambient light is just too intense. This is also an issue in my children's room. It would easily be a 5-star product if it was dimmer and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetfreak

customer_reviews.title: Casts a great amount of light for a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pack of these for a new house I'd moved into and was very pleased with the light they put out, all while sending it downwards so it doesn't shine in your face at night. I ended up not using one of the 4 in my pack for a month or so until I got my furniture moved around, then saw that it didn't work. Reached out to the seller and they are sending me a brand new box free of charge for the warranty with no questions asked. Even reaching back out to the seller they still insisted I keep the lights as a gesture of good will. Absolutely no complaints and love the lights!
customer_reviews.author: FlashFood

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: These little lights are fantastic. Exactly what I was hoping for. They light up the dark areas of the house without being blinding. As the light is being reflected off the body of the device, you are never looking directly into a light source. This is perfect for my dark hallway and staircase. Plus, they dim and brighten according to the level of darkness. I never have to worry about turning night lights on again. As they come as 4 to a box, they are extremely good value. I'll probably be buying a few more to put around the house. I definitely recommend these if you are after night lights that plug into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Shai Yammanee

customer_reviews.title: Your plugs better be vertically oriented, work in one direction only
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much a waste of time. Bad purchase on my part. There's no adjustability whatsoever in light direction. Many of my outlets are horizontally installed, so the only way these things plug into the plug holes makes the light go to the left or right. Not useful at all. And they are too bright for bedrooms. I also read they are not UL-listed. Strike two. I can buy adjustable night lights (some of which I have and use) at a big box store for half the price of these, and they are UL-listed.
customer_reviews.author: GrayslakeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my toddler as a nightlight for her bedroom and the hallway between our rooms. I wasn't expecting to love these so much! I'm so impressed at how light sensitive they are to turn off when sun comes up and when alternative lights are on. Also how soft but effective the actual light is. Pleasing to the eye- not bulky and obnoxious looking in the outlet. I even used an extra to put next to out newborns bassibet in our bedroom- it's perfect. Gentle enough to clearly see our little one without disturbing our sleep. I will definitely be ordering more to put around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, compact, and bright in the right way
customer_reviews.text: These lights work really well, great brightness and direction (their lights point downward, so if you have them in shin level outlets, you'll have a perfectly lit path). One thing: if you try to test them by covering up the sensor, don't think they're broken if they don't come on during the day. You have to cover them up completely -- any little bit of light will cause them to not turn on. Try these lights out in a dark room before returning, if they don't seem to be turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Robot Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Nice with two caveats.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice LED night lights but do have two limitations I think could be improved upon. First they need to be installed in the top receptacle in order to not block the other. Secondly, the sensor on the unit is sensitive to infrared (IR) light so if you plan to use them in a child's room that has a night vision camera/baby monitor the night light will not turn on. I won't be returning them as I found other uses for them, but I wish I knew about the IR limitation ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these lights! I got the six pack and put one in every outlet in my sons room as he is very scared of the dark. With these lights he is more comfortable and better able to sleep at night. The lights cast the sweetest, romantic glow. I love seeing their room at night with the glowy night lights scattered about. I was a bit jealous one night and tried to sleep in their room with them to share in the glowy experience, but it was way to bright for me to sleep. So if you are light sensitive, be aware that these are a bit bright, even if you only have one.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice bright LED nightlights (not for sleeping)
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of nightlights so I can walk safely around the house after dark. So I am an expert in nightlight use!! They can only be reasonably used in a vertical-down position. If your outlets are horizontal (sideways), it will blind you depending on the location. You CAN install in a baseboard horizontally, ONLY IF you are never viewing the blinding light directly (for example pointing toward a corner). I like these Eufy lights and can still use the second outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Practical Spaces

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I like the directionality of these lights, even though the direction is not adjustable. They are a little bit brighter than I would like, but I solved that by careful placement. My big negative is that of the 8 I purchased in January 2018, at least three have stopped working. I really need lights that don't have to be replaced every 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nora M

customer_reviews.title: Bright Lights, Terrible Branding
customer_reviews.text: When these light up, it shines the light right on their big logo. Brilliant . . . unless you don't want to see their branding all the time. Great marketing tactic! I wish the branding was anywhere but where the light shines the brightest. The light is really bright for a night light. It's TOO BRIGHT for a bedroom, but it might be perfect for a hall or kitchen light. They go on fine, they go off fine. The design and shape is good. So overall, give them a solid 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: P.W.A.

customer_reviews.title: Light the way!
customer_reviews.text: We have a toddler, now 5 year old, and bought these for our last apartment which had a long dark hallway separating bedrooms and bathrooms. These lights were a lifesaver and such a simple solution. They emit enough light to help navigate through the house at night without needing to turn on any additional lights which is exactly what we wanted. We use them in the bathroom and kitchen too. We’ve never tried them in a bedroom but I think they’d be too bright, at least for us. I love these. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ct Kangaroo

customer_reviews.title: Great for directing light downward
customer_reviews.text: These are great nightlights. They direct the light downward at the floor, so the don't glare in your eyes at night like most nightlights do. They're small and if you plug them into the top outlet, they won't block the lower one. The light sensor is good... they only come on when it's really dark; some other nightlights I have bought are too sensative and end up burning all day if they're in a hallway without direct sunlight, but not these. The LEDs should be long lasting and energy efficient, which I like much better than traditional nightlight bulbs. And the price for the 4 pack is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Glow with sufficient light.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these lights for a short while so am unsure of durability, but they do respond to light and turn off if there is sufficient light for the sensor. They light the hallway and bathrooms very well at night and so far I am very pleased. I like that they are LED, so are using very little power for the light they provide. They lay flat to the wall and are not sticking out for grand kids to knock them off. I would definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great little night light
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little nightlights! It's not your mommas generation either, they are "smart" enough to not turn on till it's truly dark. I have one in the main bathroom for my kids for when they get up in the middle of the night, unfortunately there's no window in there so it's pretty dark. The only natural light comes from the hall way & one would think the night light would always be on, but it's not. It's that sensitive to turn on when truly necessary. They're nice & slim, not bulky & aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but for the flicker
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these just over an year back. I love the color temperature, the brightness levels and the soft/diffused nature of the light. However, more than half my lights have started flickering randomly. I went through many reviews here and found others are also having the same problem. There are no infra red devices anywhere near these lights and that's not the problem. I really want to give this product 5 stars because it checks all my boxes, but the flicker is a deal killer.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Aravindakshan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The auto on/off feature is more sensitive than other brands I have bought over the years so it stays off with less ambient light (from windows in others rooms. I put mine in a hall bath and the hallway, neither of which get much ambient light but stay off until dark. The unit itself doesn't take up much room on the wall outlet. In the hall, it fits nicely with a wireless router in the outlet on the bottom. Color is white and it is just the right amount of brightness for nighttime bathroom trips.
customer_reviews.author: Candid

customer_reviews.title: Best little night light.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, rather unobtrusive looking night light which I think is a good thing! Has sleek lines, would fit with any decor and any room. The light comes on at dusk and goes off at dawn. It's a warm light and not too dim and not too bright. Would be enough light to move around in a room without turning on a light but yet dim enough that it would not keep you awake. I would compare it to moonlight. You know it's there but it seems "natural" and comforting. Very much doubt I would find another night light I am as happy with as this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: Night Light that lights only at night - or very dark
customer_reviews.text: These compact lights throw a (appr) 3000 k light and are not easily triggered unless darkness really falls. I have a bunch of other night lights that will come on in a shady or dim space. You can certainly see your way around with the ambient light I'm describing but still, the other lights will come on. The Eufy models only kick in when it's dark. The light doesn't obstruct the other socket in a twin-outlet setup. Also, they have a sublime design. the simple box the 4-pack comes in is also gift-worthy. I normally don't get all-a-flutter for something so basic, but when it's well thought out, everyone should at least get an idea of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Booboo Cumbers

customer_reviews.title: Responsive and bright!
customer_reviews.text: These night lights turn off with the lowest amount of light possible compared to some of my older GE night lights and turn on the moment my shadow hits it. So I’d say it’s super responsive. The LED IS BRIGHT!! It lights up about a 5 to 6 foot area which is perfect for at the top of the stairs, a bathroom, or anywhere else a light sensitive nightlight is needed. If I need to get more night lights I will be reordering these.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: Great, affordable night lights! The sensors work great and have no trouble recognizing light/dark. They don't seem to overheat at all. The light is bright enough to see in a moderately-sized bathroom at night, but not so glaring that you can't fall asleep again. I would enjoy these in a red tone, which would reduce the time it takes to get back to sleep. It would also be good for nursing moms to have a red light like this in the nursery. So I wouldn't use this for overnight nursing, but it's perfect in the toddler's room to keep away the monsters and great to see in the dark in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Emily CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These night lights are exactly what I was looking for. The light is directed downward, which is great when you're stumbling around in the middle of the night after just waking up and want don't want bring lights in your field of vision. The sensor won't turn on the light until it's pitch black, which is another big plus for me. I had another night light that would stay on 24 hours a day in a room that is dimly lit room during the day. Getting four for this price is a great deal and how much they cost to operate (30 cents a year) is an even better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Great for low-light settings
customer_reviews.text: I have several different sets of 0.5W dusk-to-dawn night lights. Some are extremely sensitive and turn on even if there's a slight shadow. These Eufy ones are at the other end of the spectrum: they turn on only when it gets very dark, which is perfect for most of my rooms. I can use the laundry and toilet rooms comfortably with nothing but this light. I prefer them to my omni-directional night lights. I can easily fit one in each of the top and bottom outlets of a standard grounded outlet pair. They're great for every room except for bedrooms, where you will want something dimmer like amber LED night lights.
customer_reviews.author: HSuke

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color these glows, so soft. My only complaint is it’s still pretty bright for a room, like my daughters, however if you place an object in front of it the sensor kicks in and goes dim. So I just keep it near her desk and as soon as it’s dark out that baby is a perfect night light. The ones I put in hall and kitchen are perfect. Just plug them in and leave them, they dim on their own and they are nice and flat when plugged in.have had for two months now and love them
customer_reviews.author: LT6173

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: There are so many night lights to choose from but I'm happy to say that this one was exactly what I wanted. It's a lot smaller/thinner than the photos make it look. It has a feature where it varies the light output based on just how dark it it. If it's kind of dark it'll be a lower light and when all lights go out for sleep it's full power. The full power is extremely pleasant and not overly bright like some of the others look to be. It's a perfect amount of light. I'll buy these again when these die.
customer_reviews.author: Quality deserves credit

customer_reviews.title: Great for hallways, bathrooms, and kitchens - a bit bright for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I find that these are perfect for the kitchen, bathrooms, and hallways in my home. Helps you to see overnight if you have to use the bathroom or grab a glass of water without the need to turn on the regular lights and hurt your eyes. I find them to be a bit bright for the bedroom, but that's a matter of preference for me. The quality is good and Eufy continues to deliver for each product I buy from them. Overall, I'd recommend. Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: A Branch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Glow & Compact Size
customer_reviews.text: Love these night lights. They glow a soft light, which is not too bright nor intrusive. If plugged in the top receptacle, the lower plug can be used. The light sensor makes this a no-brainer. I never unplug the light. I use one in my camper as the lights are not too bright & they use very little voltage. I received the lights in a short period of time & they were well packed. I happy happy with the purchase & recommend these great, economical night lights.
customer_reviews.author: jb, NP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, work very well.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Just the right amount of light without casting too much light into other rooms/areas, and just the right tone. Not too cool and not too warm (in case others care about that like my OCD does). Sensors work well and turn on and off pretty instantly when main lights are turned on and off in the room. I also appreciate that the units don't block access to the rest of the outlet, allowing you to plug in other items and leave these plugged in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MINIMALIST & PERFECT FOR NEW PARENTS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set of nightlights for when we had our first child, knowing we would be up in the night! We placed them in several areas near where we would need light at night, and they are the PERFECT amount of light, not too bright and not dim enough that it makes it difficult to see. Additionally, they are very aesthetically pleasing, user friendly, and eco-friendly, as they gradually turn off during the day. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our home
customer_reviews.text: Just built a mid-century modern home and didn’t want the funky looking night lights. We (including dogs) are still getting familiarized with the new layout and need light at night without turning on overhead can lights. These come on as the light level reaches a certain dimness. Light is not in your eyes because it is aimed downward, but provides enough light that we can walk around without bumping into walls.
customer_reviews.author: TXk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got these today and I already want to order more! I mean, who likes having to get up in the middle of the night to go “potty” only to stumble in there and then have to turn on a blaring light to do your business? NO ONE. I bought a 4 pack, one for every bathroom in our house. They give off the perfect amount of warm light to make those late night trips into the bathroom less hazardous and blinding. I also like that they are compact and unobtrusive, have sensors on them that will dim them or shut them off completely when not needed. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: and I'm so happy to have found these
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for, and I'm so happy to have found these. They're energy efficient, modern looking, and simple. I feel a lot safer walking around at night with these! Update: Eufy has wonderful customer service. I had an issue, and they reached out to me and made everything right very quickly. I was having an issue with a light, and I didn't have to return a single thing. Plus, they sent me a whole pack of lights to make up for the one I was having issues with. Now that's how you do customer service! I'll always return to Eufy to purchase night lights. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a lot of warm light, not the cheap cold LED blue that you get with some lights, sensor works very well...
customer_reviews.text: Gave these a try surprised by the brightness in a good way. The light color is a nice warm yellow as opposed to the bright cold blue you get with some LED lights, which I prefer. The sensor works well and adjusts the brightness based on ambient light. They are slim and don't stand out from the wall much so they are not as noticeable as some other products (again, something I like). Great price in my opinion for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: TroutBum

customer_reviews.title: One Star——-UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I'd never buy these again. VERY BRIGHT. I had to cover the sensor to get them to turn on. Not a good night light for a bedroom. When I could get them to work, the sensor was dim as I walked by. Basically then are a motion night light. Something has to be in front of them for them to turn on. UPDATE: the seller contacted me after my first review, and was helpful in getting me a different product. I haven’t received it yet. But they were easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Nice Brightness, Good Light Sensor
customer_reviews.text: These are handy plug-in night lights that come on automatically. They provide just enough light and fade in as the light level decreases. We have a handful of them strategically placed throughout the house. My only complaint (and it's not significant) is that they have a different styling than eufy's battery operated motion sensor night lights. If they had a similar look, that might be nice for consistency.
customer_reviews.author: schmidtw

customer_reviews.title: Very wise decision to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nightlight! I'm not sure if I would buy any other kind after using this one. This one is just amazing! The timing is perfect (goes on when the house becomes dark in the evening) and keeps the room lit well. It is pretty strong so one piece of advice would be to test it out if you are using it in a small bedroom, especially if across from a bed. It is great in the bathroom and kitchen. It's nice enough that if you wake up in the middle of the night and walk into the room, you won't be blinded by it. I am very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zabo

customer_reviews.title: Great night light! Warm light and easy on the eyes for an LED. Light sensor works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great night light. Although LED, light color is warm and easy on the eyes. The light is downcast, so it shines where it's needed. The sensor works well, too. I never have to pull them out because they're still on in daylight. We use them in hallways, bathrooms and my Dad's room, so he won't trip getting up in the night. There's no off switch for the light, so it stays on if the room doesn't receive daylight. But the night light never feels warm and is a tiny LED so it doesn't worry me to leave them on in those areas.
customer_reviews.author: IndyJen

customer_reviews.title: Great night lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They work great. I love the fact they point the light downward so it doesnt disturb you in the night to much. I just gave birth to my son a week ago and needed night lights to keep the room semi lit but dim at the same time for night time feedings. They work just like I expected, and provide the perfect amount of light. The sensor will change the level of light the little light gives off depending on how light/dark the room is. The lights turn off completely when the room is lit.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: I got these lights during Prime Day Deals and was excited to try them. I'm not sure if the areas I put them in are dark enough because the directions do say the darker the area, the brighter the light. These do not throw light the way I expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: LinSAYableTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Another vote for 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice light. The brightness is adequate for about 6 feet from wall when your eyes are night adjusted. It lights evenly. 8 of 8 worked fine and even all come on at about the same time (light intensity). Works on the top plug of a dual receptacle without blocking the bottom. I looked at the one star reviews which typically had problems with the lamps working. I haven't had these problems yet. What would make it better for me is an adjustment for both light brightness and on/off sensitivity. But for less than $4 ea, I think this is a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pallaver

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money!  UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: The company notified me immediately after my post and sent me 4 more. They didn’t ask that I update my review..they just wanted to be sure I was happy with their product. It’s been almost 6 weeks and all four are working perfectly. I love them!!! We bought the 4 pack of these little lights. Loved them when we first plugged them in. The first one blew the second night. The second one blew on the 5th night. The third blew on the 10th night. The 4th is still going..however we’ve only started our 3rd week. #EpicFail!
customer_reviews.author: Geri Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work well!!!—- Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money! They all stopped working after a few hours. This is the worst product I’ve ever bought on Amazon!!! Very disappointed! Update: The customer service was kind enough to send me a free package because I had issues with the first one but unfortunately I had the same problem they all work for only one night! Their customer service is more than 5 stars!! This is the first time I’ve been reached to fix a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Pachoue

customer_reviews.title: which I'm so in love with because no electricity goes to waste
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeee these night lights! I put one in our hallway so that we don't need to turn on the lights when going to the kitchen or bathroom at night, and also put one in our bathroom. These are light censored so they only turn on when it's completely dark in the room, which I'm so in love with because no electricity goes to waste. Even when I open a door to a room that has light, the night light would turn off and turn back on once the door is closed. I've already recommended these to a friend and highly highly recommend them. Plus, they're super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ellise Kim

customer_reviews.title: must be completely dark for them to turn on.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy these but it has to be absolutely pitch black for them to turn on. If a street light is coming through your window just a little bit these will not turn on. I do like that they only take up one socket and leave the bottom one completely free. They do produce good light when they're on. Also in the box there was a note that once these burn out, they are done so you cannot just replace the bulb you must buy a whole new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a night light that does what it is supposed to. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought MANY night lights (from dollar store all the way to the big box stores) in my 6 decades on this earth and this is by far the best one yet. It is everything the description says it is. I love that they turn on and shut off automatically, which is a bonus. I have only had and used them less than a month now, but so far I would highly recommend this product. If you are on the fence about purchasing this item...don't hesitate. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Wollman

customer_reviews.title: I like most items of Anker brand but not these
customer_reviews.text: One of the LED sensors seem to be confused when it’s day or night . It works at random to the point I can’t rely on it anymore & replaced . The light coming out of these LED’s are supper weak that yiy will need few of them every few feet to see where you are going . I wouldn’t use one per room , especially on kids room . I passed my return window but if I could I would .
customer_reviews.author: E=MC2

customer_reviews.title: Efficient LED light sensors at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set of 4 LED night sensors during a Deal of the Day. They were exactly what I was looking for. Each light is designed to be discrete and blend into the plug/ wall outlet. It has an accurate sensor that comes on if lighting is dim, and adjusts the brightness of the LED light according to how much light is available in the surrounding space. Overall a great value and I'll be looking to buy more for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated!! Great for that middle of the night trip to the loo
customer_reviews.text: Update 7-22-18 Had them for a while and I bought 2 sets 6 and 4 and all of them still work like the 1st day I have to get my youngest to the loo in the night so he doesn’t wet his bed and this lights are great. They are a little too bright actually but better than the ones we had because we used to forget to switched them off and they were on all day🤣 not with these they go on an off. Great for busy parents 👌 We liked them so much that we bought 2 sets
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: These nightlights are exactly what we wanted and a great price too!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted nightlights to guide us in halls and bathrooms at night. These lights are absolutely perfect for this purpose. They are soft and subtle in hallways and eliminate walking in pitch black. They are probably a bit too bright to put near your bed or in direct site from your bed but that isn't why we bought them. We bought a second set to light the stairs of the garage and a the last remaining halls without them. I can't think of anything they could do better.
customer_reviews.author: n0npr0phet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4-pack even though I only needed one. I handed out the spares to friends, after all they are very inexpensive. Everyone has said the same thing - they are terrific for hallways, but maybe not for a bedroom if you need darkness. Well, I wanted it for a hallway. My old one blocked both outlets, the light was too dim, and it didn't light the floor as this does. I wholeheartedly recommend these for any place other than a bedroom where the sleeper needs darkness (in which case maybe you should consider a motion-sensitive night light instead this type).
customer_reviews.author: AnnieInAcworth

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Need to be in complete dark space
customer_reviews.text: I place this lights around my house and they all automatically turn on as soon as I turn off the light. As other said, if it detects even a small amount of light, they dont turn on. So they need to be in somewhere that are completely dark. For example, I place one in my bathroom. It does not turn on every time I light a candle in there. Overall, this products work great. It emits a decent amount of brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Da

customer_reviews.title: Very nice overall design but way too bright to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice overall design but way too bright to be a nightlight. I covered the LED about 3/4 to achieve a soft night glow EDIT: I was contacted by the seller and asked to test the battery operated, stick on model of the lights. I give the seller an additional star for great service to resolve the issue. But a note, the battery operated model are still very bright. However I am pleased to note that a small piece of masking tape over the light brings them down to an acceptable level.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham DiPaolo

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I started using nightlights when my children were young. This time I purchased these because I'm living in a new home and I'm still getting the lay of the land. I purchased eight (two packs) thinking some rooms might require at least two. They give enough light and are so sensitive that I'm only using one per room. Their style lets them blend with the outlet. They aren't as noticeable (bulky) as the old ones I you find in the stores. I have extras so I stored one in my travel bag for hotel rooms and such. As for the energy efficiency, all I can say is that I have not noticed any changes in my utility bill.
customer_reviews.author: VillieG

customer_reviews.title: Light up the way!
customer_reviews.text: Best product that we have purchased this year! These night lights still put a smile on our faces when we get up in the night to take the dog out for him to conduct his business. No more tripping on toys, shoes or stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Crazycharlie

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good quality and I am hoping they last
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. They work very well and are brighter than expected. Appears to be good quality and I am hoping they last. My last set of lights (not this brand) lasted nearly 7 years. So far great value.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S

customer_reviews.title: love these ilttle nightlights!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: It's a little weird how much I love these little night lights. They are super efficient and only turn on in the dark. They are smooth, modern, minimalistic and pretty. The light is soft yet bright enough that I don't have to turn on the light when I go downstairs at night. Super useful, I have them all over the house. The Bad: Seriously nothing. Overall: The best.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Night Light
customer_reviews.text: I loved these since the minute I got them. After testing them out for almost a year now, I can say they are very efficient at only being on when there isn’t another light source in the room. They are bright so I can see at night without putting an overhead light on (ie. Perfect for bathroom at night). They are a good size so you can use both outlet spots on the wall. Great price for what you’re getting. I would definitely buy again if I needed more night lights! I love my Eufy products!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and inoffensive to the eyes at night
customer_reviews.text: Work really well - the room really does need to be, essentially, pitch black for them to illuminate. They are a very soft light. It won't show a lot in your path, but helps you to know where the wall is and get acclimated in the dark. Mine are used to be a hallway guide light, one is next to a switch in the kitchen, and helps a lot in bathrooms especially when it can reflect off the mirror a little. Very useful and inoffensive to the eyes at night.
customer_reviews.author: kikikitten

customer_reviews.title: Good Lights-Great Customer Care
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these lights for about 2 months and one just died yesterday. Based on that I'd say that they don't last very long. Update- 12/8/17- I was contacted by the company who then sent me out a new set of night lights at no charge. So far the new lights are working fine. Great level of customer care! I'm going to up my rating to 4 stars just for their follow up and policies.
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these but they’re different than I thought. They are bulkier than I expected. Not a huge deal, but I would rather they lay more flat against the outlet. And they don’t turn on gradually as the light in the house dims. For the longest time I was assuming that they were all broken. Until I realized that these nightlights turn on all at once when it gets dark enough in the room. Wasn’t super happy with that. But hey, they work. Also the light itself is brighter than I would’ve liked.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our little girl scared of the dark!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these because my 4 yo is scared of the dark and she kept asking us to get up in the middle of the night to turn lights on when she had to use the restroom so he bought this pack and placed them throughout the house so she has a lighted path to the restroom! They work perfect and she uses the restroom in the middle of the night without a peep now! They are the perfect amount of light to see but not blinding. They only turn on when it’s dark so I’m betting they last a good while. They aren’t big and bulky which I also like. Great buy, hubs!
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! I probably have 6 or 7 different types of night lights. I've been buying them for years but there are a few areas in my house (hallways, bathrooms) where they stay on all day bc there is no direct light source to trip the sensors. I bought these because of the complaints that they don't turn on easily - just what I needed. They go off during the day, on at night and don't block the other outlet if used on top. Also not the bright bluish light of most LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: psl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night lights
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to explain how happy we are. These little night lights are perfect. They have a soft white glow. Perfect for the middle of the night. They come on when it gets dark. They shut off immediately should there be light. Really really happy. We also bought the motion sensor ones which are battery operated. We are really happy with those too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Want to buy more, just don't have enough rooms!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 of these. 2 for 2 bathrooms and 1 for our kitchen. Used to have 1 in our little girls' room, they just don't need it anymore. They are perfect for our needs. Not too bright, not too dark. We thought of buying more, we just don't have more rooms to put them in. We been using them for almost 2 years now, no regrets. Would strongly recommend if you don't like rooms to be totally dark at night.
customer_reviews.author: Elize

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of light for darkened living areas
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I find them perfect for my living areas so I can walk around at night without turning on the lights. They look nice, are discreet and give a nice amount of light angled down towards the floor. I have one in my living room, dining room, kitchen and master bath. They only come on if the area is totally dark, so might not be adequate if you need additional light in low-light areas, or if you get filtered light from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Akasha

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive and BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: These night lights plug in right side up and upside down, which I really appreciate. They're also very sensitive. A flickering candle in the bathroom is enough for it to automatically turn off to save energy. The light they give off is pretty bright for a night light (definitely not a soft glow), so I use them in my hallway and living room for when I'm stumbling around in the dark. Light sleepers like me might find them too bright to use in the bedroom or ensuite bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Sparkle Pony

customer_reviews.title: Attractive stylish light
customer_reviews.text: I bought these night lights so my elderly mother in law could see her way when getting up at night. What sold me on these was another reviewer said they had a cool factor. Well I got them and tried one out in my bathroom. Yes it looks very stylish, points the light down to the floor, and has just the right amount of illumination. I really like these and would definitely buy again even if they were higher priced.
customer_reviews.author: L Marshall

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: They work well. They are bright but not too bright. Use in kids room, hallway, bathroom and kitchen. Provide just the right amount of light to see where you are going without the need to squint. I would say it’s a white light and not that off yellow tint. Nice packaging- individually wrapped night lights in the box. No issues plugging them in or keeping them in the outlet (stays tight- doesn’t fall out of socket). Able to use second socket without the nightlight being in the way. Doesn’t turn on when slightly dark (like dusky), has to be more truly dark for the sensors to turn the light on.
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Great Little LED Lights
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I hate getting hit in the eyeballs by an LED light (or any bulb for that matter) at night when walking down the hall or into the kitchen, and these lights help to illuminate the floor while not forcing you to pirate it up and keep an eyepatch over one eye to protect your night sight against photic spears of blinding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Plowden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and love it
customer_reviews.text: Just plugged in the 6 parks arrived and re-ordered another 4. It's very well designed and doesn't block two outlets as many others are. Some complains about the brightness as too much for bedroom - I can see that but it doesn't bother me much, I don't need absolute darkness to fall and stay asleep, though it's actually brighter than some other night lights I have used before. But it's not as bright as one of the reviews described.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Best for vertical outlets, not horizontal ones.
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright, perfect for hallways or in bathrooms, but too bright for a bedroom (In my opinion) my biggest frustration is that our hall outlets are all horizontal, not vertical. You can not change the orientation on these lights, so instead of the light pointing down in the hall like it’s supposed to, it points to the side. Unless they change the plug to rotate orientation, I won’t be buying these again. I’ll just keep these in the bathroom for now, where my only vertical outlets are.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P.

customer_reviews.title: awesome lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing them at our friends house and I love these. they are nice and bright and light up our hallways and other rooms. I will clarify and that it's not blinding light but they are bright, which I personally like. I bought one pack, then a second pack, and might end up buying a third pack. Definitely worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until they didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these night lights. The light detection is great, and it turns on and off instantly. The only problem I'm having is the fact that it's supposed to be LED and started dying at 9 months of use. I did just buy another 4 pack because they were on sale, but if they don't last longer than that then I won't be purchasing again. 3 stars for lack of longevity and the need to purchase again unreasonably soon, otherwise would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Every unit (of six) worked and design/operation seem pretty good. One minor problem is that the single bright LED should have a diffuser of some kind. Ironically, the plastic bag packaging itself is good for this. However, I used a piece of translucent tape. If you put this directly over the LED it won't do anything. Stretched over the housing so that it is about 1/2" away from the LED is ideal. The manufacturer should think about this.
customer_reviews.author: David Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Great light, great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They are so nice and compact. For being as small as they are they emit quite a good amount of light. A 4 pack is a good number too. One thing I really like is how sensitive these are towards detecting light. I basically had to put my whole hand over the sensor before the light turned on, which is nice in an energy saving standpoint, even though these use next to no electricity. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the nightlight
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have not yet experience any issues with this nightlight like some users did. The sensor on this thing works great. Doesn’t save a whole bunch of money to be honestly because seriously, how much can you save from a small night light year round? Anyway, item exactly as described and the light isn’t too bright. Just a soft white that doesn’t hurt the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Yan

product_meta.title: eufy by Anker, Lumi Plug-in Night Light, Warm White LED, Dusk-to-Dawn Sensor, Bedroom, Bathroom, Kitchen, Hallway, Stairs, Energy Efficient, Compact, Light 4-Pack
feature_bullets: IDEAL LIGHTING: Provides the right amount of glare-free lighting to guide you in the dark.
AUTOMATIC ILLUMINATION: Automatically turns on only when ambient lighting becomes insufficient.
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Requires less than 30 cents a year to operate. Based on 12 hours of usage per day and 0.11/kWh.
COMPACT SIZE: Does not obstruct the second outlet.
WHAT YOU GET: 4x Lumi Plug-In Night Lights, User Manual, Happy Card, 18-month warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,499 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
